page.title: 08A DAY AT ENGAINES SCHOOL
page.content: Friday is my favourite day at School. Its the day we go swimming.But first we have an Assembly for the School. We leave at 9.30 & travel by coach to Clacton Pool.We do different strokes each week & sometimes we try for our Grade I.When we come back,our teacher takes us for English topics. After dinner the boys usually play football but the girls play French Skipping.Its played with a piece of elastic four metres long,tied together then put round two people's ankles.Girls take turns jumping it, inside the elastic, then outside.Finally you jump onto the elastic with both feet.Once all the people have jumped it, the elastic is raised higher & higher.In the after_ noon we do maths. Sometimes we have the vicar for a while afterwards. 3 p.m. is our hometime, but after School we have rounders & athletics clubs.
